title: Vista’s Sheth Resigns Weeks After CEO Smith Settles Tax Probe
sub_head: Brian Sheth left the technology investor barely a month after the yearslong tax investigation of Robert Smith ended
body:
Vista Equity Partners co-founder Brian Sheth has departed the firm, confirming rumors about an impending split at the top of one of the most successful technology investment firms in private equity.
Vista announced Mr. Sheth’s resignation as president of the firm, effective immediately, on Thursday afternoon.
